text:
Good Return | Phnom Penh, Cambodia | IT Internship - software development | Part time | ONSITE | INTERNS

Good Return is an Australian not for profit organisation with staff in several locations such as Cambodia, Laos, Nepal, Tonga and the Solomon Islands. Good Returnâ€™s mission is to enable those living in poverty to achieve economic empowerment through responsible financial inclusion and capability development. We have several software tools to aid the learning programs in Cambodia, Laos, Nepal and we are currently expanding these tools to the Solomon Islands.

We are looking for a Phnom Penh based university undergrad who has in interest in software development, mobile and web applications and even blockchain to work with the existing and in-development software projects.

For the PD and details on how to apply please visit: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1WcucTepz_dYvtS-1TMq9ZQTvhFZ...
